author: Special Correspondent
title: Nithiin postpones April wedding, following COVID-19 outbreak and lockdown
description: The Telugu actor also urged his fans not to conduct his birthday celebrations, and instead stay safe at home
content:
In February, actor Nithiin had posted a photograph from his engagement ceremony on Twitter and had sought everyones blessings. He and his fiancé Shalini were scheduled to get married on April 16 at Palazzo Versace, Dubai.
However, the Coronavirus outbreak an… [+884 chars]
